body.name: Neutrogena Skin Balancing Kaolin Clay Cleanser with 2% Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA), Mattifying & Conditioning Face Wash for Oily Skin, Paraben-Free, Soap-Free, Sulfate-Free, 6.3 fl oz
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 6 mins
features: Absorb excess oil with Neutrogena Skin Balancing and Mattifying Clay Cleanser with 2% PHA and kaolin clay for oily skin

Conditioning face wash for oily skin is formulated with dermatologist-grade 2% Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA), a dual-action ingredient that gently exfoliates skin while attracting and retaining moisture.Wet face. Apply to hands, add water and work into a lather. Massage face gently. Rinse thoroughly

Kaolin clay mattifying cleanser effectively targets 100% of pore-clogging dirt while respecting skin's natural moisture barrier, leaving your skin soft and perfectly balanced. Plus, it is effective for cleansing before and after wearing your mask
This oily skin face wash is hypoallergenic, respects skin's natural pH and moisture barrier and is developed with dermatologists. From Neutrogena, a dermatologist recommended skincare brand
Clay cleanser is formulated to be paraben-free, soap-free, sulfate-free, phthalate-free, alcohol-free, and dye-free. Recyclable bottle is made with 30% post-consumer recycled plastic
body.description: Cleanse, balance, and mattify with Neutrogena Skin Balancing Clay Facial Cleanser. From a dermatologist recommended skincare brand, this clay & PHA face wash for oily skin cleanses, absorbs excess oil, and conditions to leave skin soft and perfectly balanced. Specially designed with dermatologists, this hypoallergenic formula respects skin's natural pH and moisture barrier. This mattifying cleanser contains kaolin clay, to effectively target pore-clogging dirt, and 2% polyhydroxy acid (PHA), a powerful liquid exfoliant and humectant that decongests down to the pores. The pH balancing cleanser is paraben-, soap-, sulfate-, phthalate-, alcohol-, and dyefree. For best results, this mattifying cleanser can be used daily as part of your at-home skincare routine and is effective for cleansing before and after wearing your mask.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Skin Balancing Clay Facial Cleanser For Oily Skin The one that mattifies + conditions. Meet the perfect match for oily skin! This plush clay cleanser is formulated with gentle PHA to exfoliate and condition skin at the same time. Infused with mattifying kaolin clay, it absorbs excess oil while respecting skin’s delicate moisture barrier. The result? Soft, balanced skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans skin thoroughly, gentle, dies not dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product for oily and sensitive skin. It's the only cleanser that makes my face feel really clean.If you let this cleanser remain on your skin for more than a couple minutes it will dry out your skin quite a bit. If that happens (especially with combination skin), this can make my skin feel tight so I sometimes add a little moisturizer after using this.I've tried every facial cleanser made by Olay and cetaphil, cerave foaming, dove, etc. I would wash my face three times a day and it would still never feel clean. The only facial cleanser I ever liked this much was a custom product sold through an esthetician for eight times this price but can't get anymore and I hadn't been able to find anything like it. That was a green cleanser with a unique odor - I believe that's the same clay that's used in this new Neutrogena product. This Neutrogena cleanser is very similar to that; but a little more extreme and drying - which I don't mind terribly since I could follow up with a moisturizer or reduce the amount of time I let it sit on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clear face in days
reviews.reviewText: Love love love this stuff. The clay absorbs oil and I noticed a great difference in my face after a few days. Works great at getting make up off! Nice tingle too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a less expensive kaolin clay wash since my Rodan+Fields is a little pricey. This is the first I’ve found that I’ve actually liked. It has a pleasant smell and the pump dispenser is very convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: The clay is amazing for my oily skin and acne! I put it on my face while I shower, and don't rinse off till the end. It's like having a clay mask on every day! I couldn't find this in the stores anymore and switched and I broke out horrible. I found out it on Amazon and my skin healed and calmed my skin immediately! I LOVE this stuff! Please never discontinue this product!!Yes - the spot clogs but it's the clay doing that and a small inconvenience. Just scrap it off!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Clogs up the dispenser and I dislike the scent
reviews.reviewText: I love clay cleansers and always try different ones. The formula here is good, but I won't buy it again because the dispenser clogs immediately (usually a coconut-derived ingredient that solidifies), so it is a hassle to unclog and try to use. I also dislike the added scent, which is an odd, old-smelling fragrance. The constantly-clogged dispenser means I'll probably end up throwing this away, which is a waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked how it felt and the outcome from it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greasy forehead solved!
reviews.reviewText: This has been great for my oily skin without drying me out. I have battled acne for years and this is the only product I've found that keeps me clear using it morning and night. I've been using for over a year now and have been very happy with it. My forehead doesn't feel like a KFC floor anymore. The skin perfecting serum at night helps as well.
